titles.title: End the Partisan IRS Culture Act
EPIC Act
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to exempt the Internal Revenue Service from certain labor-management relations requirements.
EPIC Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
End the Partisan IRS Culture Act or the EPIC Act
This bill excludes employees of the Internal Revenue Service from provisions of federal personnel law allowing federal employees to organize, bargain collectively, and participate in labor organizations.
